title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Social Care Industry)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Social Care Industry) 

Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (social care industry) order 2025

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the conduct and documentation of social care assessments; 

the design, provision and review of social care plans or supports; 
and 

the coordination, implementation and supervision of social care 
interventions in a residential or community care setting.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) (b) (c) conduct documentation social care assessment design provision review social care plan support coordination implementation supervision social care intervention residential community care setting

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: 3. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
3. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [408] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 5 June 2025. 

The Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [408]

title: section 23 of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) and by section 38
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the social care industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
